entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 3.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Blowing snow in open areas overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
